title: Tesla says production-ready Optimus robot is coming soon
full_text:
Tesla says production-ready Optimus robot is coming soon. In its earnings report, Tesla says that the third-generation version of its Optimus humanoid robot "meant for mass production" will be unveiled in the first quarter of 2026. This new version of Optimus will include "major upgrades from version 2.5, including ….
The company will reveal its Gen 3 robot in the first quarter of 2026. The company will reveal its Gen 3 robot in the first quarter of 2026. by Andrew J. Hawki… [+2373 chars]
